data.comment: Today's referee, Armando Villarreal, has blown to start the match.
Armando Villarreal signals a Colorado throw-in in Minnesota's half.
In the minute 2, Important block from the Minnesota defence as Jack Price fires in a strike for Colorado.
Can Colorado get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Minnesota's half?
Colorado have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
In the minute 4, Goal kick for Minnesota at Allianz Field.
Colorado pushes forward through Jonathan Lewis, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ball safe as Colorado is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Minnesota at Allianz Field.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Colorado in their own half.
Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Minnesota in the half of Colorado.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Colorado in their own half.
In the minute 12, Colorado to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
Colorado awarded a free kick in their own half.
Armando Villarreal signals a Minnesota throw-in in Colorado's half.
In the minute 14, Robin Lod gets his shot on target but fails to score for Minnesota.
Colorado awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Paul.
In the minute 18, In Saint Paul, Minnesota push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
Corner awarded to Colorado.
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a Minnesota goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal! Kevin Molino gives Minnesota a 1-0 lead in Saint Paul.
In the minute 22, Emanuel Reynoso instrumental with a fine assist.
Armando Villarreal awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Colorado in their own half.
In the minute 24, Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Colorado.
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
Colorado's Younes Namli misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 27, Armando Villarreal awards Minnesota a goal kick.
Throw-in Minnesota.
Can Minnesota get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Colorado's half?
In the minute 29, Colorado to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
Corner awarded to Colorado.
Emanuel Reynoso (Minnesota) fires in a shot â€“ and hits the post!
In the minute 32, Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
Colorado have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Minnesota in the half of Colorado.
In the minute 33, Colorado awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Saint Paul a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Colorado in their own half.
In the minute 36, Minnesota are pushing forward but Robin Lod's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Colorado at Allianz Field.
Younes Namli (Colorado) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 45, At Allianz Field the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Minnesota in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Nicolas Benezet is on a sub for Jonathan Lewis for Colorado.
Throw-in Colorado.
In the minute 49, In Saint Paul, Nicolas Benezet of Colorado is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Free kick Minnesota.
At Allianz Field, Lalas Abubakar has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 52, Cole Bassett of Colorado gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Paul.
Michael Boxall (Minnesota) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 54, Goal! Robin Lod extends Minnesota's lead to 2-0.
Great play from Emanuel Reynoso to set up the goal.
Armando Villarreal awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Colorado at Allianz Field.
Free kick for Minnesota in the half of Colorado.
Ball safe as Colorado is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 64, Colorado push forward at Allianz Field and Diego Rubio gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Minnesota defence.
Minnesota push upfield but Armando Villarreal quickly pulls them for offside.
Kellyn Acosta for Colorado drives towards goal at Allianz Field. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 67, Minnesota are coming forward and Kevin Molino gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Armando Villarreal awards Colorado a goal kick.
Kei Kamara is replacing Ethan Finlay for Minnesota at Allianz Field.
In the minute 70, In Saint Paul Colorado drive forward through Younes Namli. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Colorado have a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Minnesota have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
The away team replace Younes Namli with Sam Vines.
Minnesota's Hassani Dotson misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Colorado goal kick.
In the minute 73, Minnesota drives forward and Robin Lod gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Goal kick for Minnesota at Allianz Field.
Armando Villarreal signals a throw-in for Minnesota, close to Colorado's area.
In the minute 77, Minnesota's Kevin Molino gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Field. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Minnesota's Jan Gregus gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Colorado defender.
Kevin Molino puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
In the minute 79, That's a fine assist from Jan Gregus.
Minnesota's Kei Kamara is on target but unsuccessful.
Adrian Heath (Minnesota) is making a second substitution, with Osvaldo Alonso replacing Marlon Hairston.
Robin Fraser is making the team's fourth substitution at Allianz Field with Nicolas Mezquida replacing Kellyn Acosta.
In the minute 81, The away team have replaced Andre Shinyashiki with Braian Galvan. This is the third substitution made today by Robin Fraser.
Cole Bassett of Colorado smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Colorado close to the penalty box.
Jacori Hayes is replacing Emanuel Reynoso for the home team.
Armando Villarreal signals a Colorado throw-in in Minnesota's half.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Minnesota in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Paul.
Colorado awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Colorado.
Minnesota awarded a free kick in their own half.
Colorado are coming forward and Braian Galvan gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 89, Armando Villarreal awards Minnesota a goal kick.
Throw-in Minnesota.
In Saint Paul Colorado attack through Diego Rubio. The finish is off target, however.
Minnesota have a goal kick.
Free kick Colorado.
Armando Villarreal will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Colorado to take a throw-in in Minnesota territory.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Minnesota in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-0.
